name: Sketches
overview: Everything from early conceptual designs to quick 3D visualization renders to testing documents to abandoned CAD creations.

images.name: Planar Arm
description: An unfortunately abandoned CAD model for a 5-DOF robotic arm driven by stepper motors. Derived from the first iteration design for the Wrist Unit I was working on for McGill Robotics.

images.name: MachineWriting Notebook
description: Some of the pages from the design process for the MachineWriting project. These pages outline the process of tuning and tweaking the settings and doing the first round of optimization.

images.name: SSMU Ski and Snowboard Club
description: Entry to the 2014-15 season ski and snowboard club apparel design contest. Never printed; beaten in this contest by a remake of the familar face of the Pabst Blue Ribbon can with SSMUSKI written on the label.

images.name: Nu, Pogodi! Traces
description: Traced sketch from the Societ take on Tom and Jerry.

images.name: Flybrake
description: Fake Business Proposal cover for a fake Business built around a piece of technology that doesn't exist yet.

images.name: Glitches
description: The name describes it perfectly: Glitch Art.
Made by quite literally deleting chunks of (presumably relevant) byte sequences from images of various different formats, mainly '.tiff' due to its robust nature.
None of the source images are original.

images.name: Isometric Vector Design
description: Quite unfinished attemt to model my first-year dormitory room from an isometric view.
Yes the room was really that small. This model is roportionally accurate.

images.name: Virginia Square
description: Quite unfinished wireframe of a cetain station on the Orange Line.
